div.bibl: Skandinaven (Daily Edition), Aug. 23, 1910. THE NORWEGIAN TOWN MISSION[Report by Reverend C. W. Finwall]

body.p: The Norwegian Town Mission, 2808 West North Avenue, reports:
That eleven thousand unemployed have visited the library in the last eleven and a half months;
That an additional sixty-two hundred have attended the prayer meetings;
That seventy men and thirty women have been given jobs;
That thirty families have received assistance;
That about thirty papers and magazines have been subscribed to by the Mission.
